mcq.statement: Choose the correct example of a complex sentence: The bell rang, and the students rushed out., She felt tired, so she went to bed., Although we were late, we caught the train., He plays the guitar, but his sister plays drums.

options.a: He plays the guitar, but his sister plays drums.
options.b: Although we were late, we caught the train.
options.c: She felt tired, so she went to bed.
